name: The Minderoo Foundation Pty Ltd ATF The Minderoo Foundation Trust
legal: private company limited by shares as trustee for a charitable foundation trust
goal: We are a modern philanthropinc organisation that takes on tough, persistent issues to drive massive change. Our current global initiatives include building community (working with big-thinking partners to identify projects that will benefit arts, culture and community, both in Australia and internationally), eliminate cancer (through leadership, influence and resources, catalysing a global movement of collaboration to accelerate cancer research and improve prevention, detection, and treatment), flourishing oceans (working to help the oceans regain a flourishing state and eliminating plastic pollution), generation one (ending disparity between Indigenous and non-Indigenous Australians in our generation through reforming specific policies and creating sustainable training and employment opportunities), research (developing new research on critical areas of impact that are important to Minderoo’s seven core initiatives, as well as leveraging the knowledge platforms developed by each), thrive by five (promoting a long-term, evidence-based strategy to create a culture that prioritises children to ensure that all Australian kids have the best start to life), walk free (a mission to end modern slavery in our generation by mobilising a global activist movement, generating the highest quality research, enlisting business, and raising unprecedented levels of capital to drive change in those countries and industries bearing the greatest responsibility for modern slavery today).
interests: Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation
